content.query:
-- Please change the storage account name according to your environment

Select * FROM
(
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://fasthackadlpt3.dfs.core.windows.net/curated/streaming/spark_structured_streaming_using_synapse/structured_streaming_eh/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
) a 
order by a.enqueuedTime desc
